```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(gridExtra)
library(ggmap)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
wdpa<- read_csv("data/WDPA_Nov2019-csv.csv")
```

```{r fig.height= 3.5, fig.width= 2.5}
yr <- wdpa %>% 
  filter(MARINE == "0") %>%
  group_by(STATUS_YR) %>%
  summarise(area = sum(REP_AREA)) 

yr3 <- wdpa %>% filter(ISO3 %in% c("CHN", "USA", "IND", "BRA"), STATUS_YR > 1980) %>% 
  filter(MARINE == "0") %>%
  group_by(STATUS_YR, ISO3) %>%
  summarise(area = sum(REP_AREA)) 


yrIUCN <- wdpa %>% filter(IUCN_CAT == c("III","IV", "V")) %>%
  filter(MARINE == "0") %>%
  group_by(STATUS_YR, IUCN_CAT) %>%
  summarise(area = sum(REP_AREA)) 

a <-yr %>% ggplot(aes(STATUS_YR, area)) + geom_line(color = "blue") + xlim(1980, 2018) + geom_vline(xintercept = c(2000,2011), linetype = "longdash", color = c("red", "black")) + theme(legend.position="bottom") + labs(y = "Area added (Ha)", x = "Year") + theme_minimal() 


b<- yrIUCN %>% ggplot(aes(STATUS_YR, area)) + geom_line(aes(colour = factor(IUCN_CAT))) + xlim(1980, 2018) +  geom_vline(xintercept = c(2000, 2011), linetype = "longdash", color = c("red", "black")) +  theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position=c(.2, .8))+ theme(legend.title = element_blank()) + labs(y = "Area added (Ha)", x = "Year") 

ggarrange(a, b,
          labels = c("A", "B"),
          ncol = 1, nrow = 2)
```
